text: John Robert Geoffrey Neale (21 September 1926 – 17 July 2020) was a British Anglican bishop. From 1974 to 1988, he was the first suffragan Bishop of Ramsbury in the Church of England and the first area bishop under that diocese's from 1981 to 2009.Salisbury Diocesan Synod minutes – 99th session, 7 November 2009 p. 3 (Accessed 23 April 2014) Neale died on 17 July 2020 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Church of England bishops Category:British military personnel of World War II
title: John Neale (bishop)
